creator: ismet.osman@rbs.co.uk
text:
Created attachment 28858
Crash Analysis from Microsoft

The jakarta isapi plugin dll periodically crashes and causes IIS to stop accepting connections. 

Microsoft have analysed the crash logs (see attached). They believe the error is caused when jakarta is trying to write logs and the dll address the wrong memory space

creator: mturk@apache.org
text:
We currently have 1.2.37 in VOTE process that fixes this (and similar) issue.
You can check release candidate from:
http://people.apache.org/~mturk/tomcat-connectors/jk-1.2.37/
